imdb.plot outline: After arriving in Hollywood to pursue their illustrious career of 'making it' in Hollywood, Belvy, Winchester, E-Dog, and Phillip hear that the 'W' is the HOTTEST place to stay in town, so... they post up behind the 'W' of the Hollywood sign, and embark on their adventure. Broadcasting his morning radio show 'WFLY' from atop the city, Belvy and his three friends engage with the Hollywood elite (and not-so-elite) in their daily struggle of climbing that slippery ladder to success, and we see Tinsel Town from a place that only a 'bird trying to make it big' can... and where it's a lot easier to take a dump on things...
imdb.title: The B-List
plot: An animated series exploring the fringe of the Hollywood 'in crowd'. Welcome to '_The B-List_ (qv)'.::Anonymous

After arriving in Hollywood to pursue their illustrious career of 'making it' in Hollywood, Belvy, Winchester, E-Dog, and Phillip hear that the 'W' is the HOTTEST place to stay in town, so... they post up behind the 'W' of the Hollywood sign, and embark on their adventure. Broadcasting his morning radio show 'WFLY' from atop the city, Belvy and his three friends engage with the Hollywood elite (and not-so-elite) in their daily struggle of climbing that slippery ladder to success, and we see Tinsel Town from a place that only a 'bird trying to make it big' can... and where it's a lot easier to take a dump on things...::S.M. Campbell
